page.title: 03EDUCATION_PEEL PARK 1985
page.content: In our school there are 16 classes for 4 to 11 year olds.There is also an office,music room,staff room,woodwork room,a drama room and a library.We sit on{wooden chairs and have wooden desks with lids on. We use paper backed books and write with a biropen or a pencil.We have school dinners or you can bring a packed lunch from home. Some of the subjects we have are Mathematics,English,Geography,History, Handwriting,Spellings and Science.At the front of the classroom is a {blackboards}and the teacher writes onit,with a piece of chalk.To colour pictures we use felt-tipped pens, pencil crayons,waxed crayons or paints To sharpen our pencils we use a pencil-sharpener and we can also rub out pencil with a rubber. By Gillian Slee and Colleen Holmes.
